issue.title: [C++][Docs] Consistent variable names in WriteCSV example
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14116](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14116). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The [CSV output documentation](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/csv.html) uses options instead of write options, which is inconsistent and unclear.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14116?focusedCommentId=17419943) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11228
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11228>
